name: Return of the Shamei Maru
description:
With the help of up to two colours, you must uncover a dastardly plot!

Heavily copied from inspired by "Return of the Obra Dinn" by Lucas Pope, which everyone should play right now!

Credits to:

Dither shader by Keijiro Takahashi, link
